Conference on Energy Conversion, 30-31 October 2017, UTM KL
===========================================================

by [powerpic](https://fke.utm.my/author/powerpic/ "Posts by powerpic")
 | Mar 3, 2017 | [POWER](https://fke.utm.my/category/power/)

![](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/cencon2017-banner-v2-1080x616.png)

![cencon2017-banner-v2](https://fke.utm.my/wp-content/uploads/2017/03/cencon2017-banner-v2.png)

**About CENCON 2017**

The 3rd IEEE Conference on Energy Conversion (CENCON 2017) will be held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia on 30–31 October 2017. The objective of the conference is to share the latest research in the areas of power electronics, electrical drives, renewable energy, modeling and control systems. At the same time, it allows the international delegates to discover the “Beautiful and Peaceful Malaysia”.

More details about CENCON 2017 can be found [here](http://sites.ieee.org/cencon-2017/)
.
